title: "doasm: notfound" error during linking
body:
$ env | grep ^GO
GOARCH=amd64
GOROOT=/home/nigeltao/go
GOOS=linux

$ 6g -V
6g version weekly.2011-05-22 8534

$ cat main.go
package main
func main() {
	var u uint
	var _ interface{} = 1.0 + 1<<u
}

$ 6g main.go

$ 6l main.6
main.main: doasm: notfound from=34 to=13 (5)	ADDSD	X0,BX
